resources.string: Your operator does not support disabling call-forwarding when your phone is busy.
"Your service provider does not support disabling call forwarding when your phone isn't answered."
No voicemail number is stored on the SIM card.
You cannot make outgoing calls while call barring is on.
Turn off Airplane mode to place a call
Could not add/edit fixed dialling contact. Check PIN2 or SIM card storage capacity.
Note that microphone noise suppression works only when you talk directly into the phone, not when you use the speaker or a headset.
PUK2 locked. Contact operator to unlock.
Could not delete fixed dialling contact
"I'm on another call at the moment, I'll call you back later."
"I'm busy at the moment, I'll call you back later."
"I'm on another call at the moment, I'll call you back later."
"I'm in a meeting at the moment, I'll call you back later."
"I'm driving at the moment, I'll call you back later."
"I'm eating at the moment, I'll call you back later."

"Answering Machine differs from the voicemail service provided by your operator. This feature picks up incoming calls for you, plays your specified greeting and records callers' messages on your Xperia™.
*Answering Machine is unavailable when the device is in flight mode or out of network coverage. *At least one greeting must be recorded before use."

"Answering Machine differs from the voicemail service provided by your operator. This feature picks up incoming calls for you, plays your specified greeting and records callers' messages on your Xperia™.
*Answering Machine is unavailable when the device is in flight mode or out of network coverage."
Depending on the ringing time you specify here, your voicemail may pick up incoming calls before Answering Machine.
Please be aware that using Answering Machine abroad may result in substantial roaming charges.
Use Answering Machine when travelling abroad
You have a missed call. Did you know that there is a built-in Answering Machine in your Xperia™? Tap here to enable it.
Number not in fixed dialling no list
No outgoing calls. Call barring is on.
USSD message must be between %d and %d characters in length. Please try again.
No voicemail number is stored on the SIM card.
The SIM PINs you typed do not match. Please try again.
Use default operator settings to display my number in outgoing calls
Fixed dialling numbers setting is turned on. Some call-related features may not work.
Could not connect to the selected network. Make sure that the SIM card is inserted or the selected network is available.
